title: HPE security advisory (AV25-577)
description: On September 8, 2025, HPE published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: HPE Telco Intelligent Assurance FAS and PDO  versions prior to 4.2.8
HPE Intelligent Assurance Telco INT-A FAS and PDO  versions prior to v4.2.7
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
